I've discovered an alloy with very interesting properties, called Wakurium. This material can transmit energy pulses very quickly.
This allows me to transfer any form of information quickly and with no fear of data loss. Many potential applications exist for such a technology.
I am now able to attach more Calculation-Modules to the researcher, by using the network. Additionally I should improve them with better components. Currently, 2-4 Modules should be appropriate.
Note: New research is available in "Logistics"!
